document_data.mainbody:
heth Thanion was an innkeep inhabiting the city of Waterdeep during the mid-to-late 14 century DR.
Cheth was a large man who was easy to get along with. He had a knack for always remembering a face and never forgot when someone owed him money.
Cheth owned the Wandering Wemic located at the corner of Satchel Alley and Diamond Street in Waterdeeps Sea Ward.
